"Managing Your Shop":
"About Putting Items up for Sale

Here, you can sell your items, set your advertisement, and collect your sales proceeds.

To sell an item, select a \"New Slot\", then select the item you want to sell from the list. Then select the item you added and set its price.

The actual price when another player buys your item will be the price you set here plus the sales tax (Meseta). The price including tax will be displayed in the Set Price window.

"

"Withdraw Items and Other Operations

You can withdraw items that are on sale to your inventory or Storage. On the list, select one or more items to withdraw, then select the Withdraw button.

You can also enter the advertisement that will appear when other players view your shop, and collect your proceeds from the items you have sold.
